## useConst() function

Use a memorized value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useConst<T>(fn: () => T): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fn | () =&gt; T | A function whose return value will be memorized. |

<b>Returns:</b>

T

The memorized value.
